DOC.HEADLINE: NEWSWIRE
DOC.TEXT: Speedskating In another race , Manabu Horii of Japan broke the track record in the final 500-meter World Cup race of the season , clocking 36.25 seconds , and beating Dan Jansen , who had already won the overall gold medal . Jansen said he would not decide until the summer whether to continue skating another season , but Olympic gold medalist Bonnie Blair said she will skate for one more year so she can compete at the World Championships in Milwaukee next year .
